name: UltraISO Backup Disk Image
summary: Learn about .UIBAK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: UIBAK files may be created automatically, depending on the program's settings. To change UltraISO's backup configuration, first select Optionsâ†’Configuration, then click the "Save" tab to view the file saving options.

description: Backup of an .ISO disk image saved with UltraISO; may be used to recover a disk image if the original file becomes corrupted or is deleted; typically named "[filename].iso.uibak" and can be opened by removing the "uibak" part of the extension.
